verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Verse:
We lift You up
We lift You up
Lord Jesus, in our worship
We lift You up

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
We lift You up
We lift You up
Lord Jesus, in the way we live
We lift You up

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
For there is no-one like You
There is no-one like You
There is no-one like You
We lift you up

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
Bridge:
So I arise, arise, arise
And glorify Your name
Glorify Your name

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
I know that You're alive
You paid the highest price to have me
Near to Your throne

verse.name: b2
verse.lines:
Tag:
You alone are worthy
You alone are holy God
